CustomField.formula:
IF(Software_Partner_Margin_Renewal__c = 0 ,(Software_Attributable_Amount_total__c * Software_Partner_Margin_Y1__c),
Software_Attributable_Amount_total__c * IF( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Margin_Type__c , 'Initial Purchase') , Software_Partner_Margin_Y1__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(Partner_Margin_Type__c , 'Renewal'), Software_Partner_Margin_Renewal__c,0.00 )))
CustomField.label: Software - Partner Margin Amount
